MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L11 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Storrington Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.24PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:16 AM on Friday, 19 March 2021
